name: ArangoDB
summary: An open-source database with a flexible data model for documents, graphs, and key-values. Build high performance applications using a convenient sql-like query language or JavaScript extensions.
details: An open-source database with a flexible data model for documents, graphs, and key-values. Build high performance applications using a convenient sql-like query language or JavaScript extensions.

name: Box Platform Team
summary: Box Inc. (formerly Box.net) is an online file sharing and Cloud content management service for enterprise companies. The company has adopted a freemium business model, and provides 5 GB of free storage [3] for personal accounts. A mobile version of the service is available for Android, BlackBerry, iOS, WebOS, and Windows Phone devices. The company is based in Los Altos, California.
details: Box Inc. (formerly Box.net) is an online file sharing and Cloud content management service for enterprise companies. The company has adopted a freemium business model, and provides 5 GB of free storage [3] for personal accounts. A mobile version of the service is available for Android, BlackBerry, iOS, WebOS, and Windows Phone devices. The company is based in Los Altos, California.

name: Facebook
summary: Facebook is an online social networking service that allows its users to connect with friends and family as well as make new connections. It provides its users with the ability to create a profile, update information, add images, send friend requests, and accept requests from other users. Its features include status update, photo tagging and sharing, and more.
details: Facebook is an online social networking service that allows its users to connect with friends and family as well as make new connections. It provides its users with the ability to create a profile, update information, add images, send friend requests, and accept requests from other users. Its features include status update, photo tagging and sharing, and more.

name: Hiveage
summary: Hiveage is an online billing service for freelancers and small businesses, designed and developed by Vesess. Being a small business ourselves, weu0026rsquo;re well aware of the difficulties they face in managing finances, and Hiveage is our take on how to simplify the process.
details: Hiveage is an online billing service for freelancers and small businesses, designed and developed by Vesess. Being a small business ourselves, weu0026rsquo;re well aware of the difficulties they face in managing finances, and Hiveage is our take on how to simplify the process.

name: Intuit Developer
summary: The Intuit Partner Platform (IPP) is an open platform that enables developers to integrate with rich financial and transactional data through REST-based APIs and offers unparalleled reach to millions of small businesses through Intuit Apps.com.u0026nbsp;An open platform with global reach. Apps using the API have access to the Intuit QuickBooks Online customer base of more than 1.3 million small busine
details: The Intuit Partner Platform (IPP) is an open platform that enables developers to integrate with rich financial and transactional data through REST-based APIs and offers unparalleled reach to millions of small businesses through Intuit Apps.com.u0026nbsp;An open platform with global reach. Apps using the API have access to the Intuit QuickBooks Online customer base of more than 1.3 million small business users.u0026nbsp;

name: LemonStand
summary: LemonStand eCommerce Inc. provides eCommerce software and solutions to mid-sized merchants. Their primary customer are web developers that are seeking a flexible solution that will provide an enjoyable development experience, while meeting their customeru0026rsquo;s requirements, and being easy to use for the day-to-day operations.
details: LemonStand eCommerce Inc. provides eCommerce software and solutions to mid-sized merchants. Their primary customer are web developers that are seeking a flexible solution that will provide an enjoyable development experience, while meeting their customeru0026rsquo;s requirements, and being easy to use for the day-to-day operations.

name: Seneca JS
summary: A Micro-Services toolkit for Node.js. This toolkit lets you write clean code that you can scale without needing to refactor. Start with everything in one process, and split it all out onto multiple systems when you need to.
details: A Micro-Services toolkit for Node.js. This toolkit lets you write clean code that you can scale without needing to refactor. Start with everything in one process, and split it all out onto multiple systems when you need to.

name: Shipwire
summary: Shipwire product fulfillment provides growing product manufacturers and retailers with e-commerce order fulfillment services powered by a global warehouse network and its Cloud Logistics platform. Shipwire eliminates the hassle of storage and shipping, so merchants can focus on growth. Convenient facility locations: Warehouse Los Angeles, warehouse Chicago, warehouse Toronto, warehouse Vancouver,
details: Shipwire product fulfillment provides growing product manufacturers and retailers with e-commerce order fulfillment services powered by a global warehouse network and its Cloud Logistics platform. Shipwire eliminates the hassle of storage and shipping, so merchants can focus on growth. Convenient facility locations: Warehouse Los Angeles, warehouse Chicago, warehouse Toronto, warehouse Vancouver, warehouse London. Shipwire allows merchants to drastically reduce shipping costs by locating inventory closer to buyers. Merchants send inventory to Shipwire and connect Shipwire to their online store, marketplace listings or order systems. As orders flow to Shipwire, Shipwire optimizes the order for least-cost delivery and fulfills the order from the warehouse located closest to the buyer.

name: Slack
summary: Slack is a team communication application providing services such as real-time messaging, archiving, and to search for modern teams. It offers one-on-one messaging, private groups, persistent chat rooms, and direct messaging as well as group chats organized by topic. All content inside Slack is searchable from one search box and it integrates with a number of third-party services, including Google
details: Slack is a team communication application providing services such as real-time messaging, archiving, and to search for modern teams. It offers one-on-one messaging, private groups, persistent chat rooms, and direct messaging as well as group chats organized by topic. All content inside Slack is searchable from one search box and it integrates with a number of third-party services, including Google Docs, Dropbox, Heroku, Crashlytics, GitHub, and Zendesk.

name: Vimeo
summary: Vimeo is a cleanly-designed video sharing website that allows people to publish their videos for public consumption or just for friends and family. Vimeo launched support for high definition video in October 2007, further establishing itself as a leading video hosting platform. The website is owned by the media conglomerate IAC/InterActiveCorp and operated by Connected Ventures.
details: Vimeo is a cleanly-designed video sharing website that allows people to publish their videos for public consumption or just for friends and family. The website is owned by the media conglomerate IAC/InterActiveCorp and operated by Connected Ventures.
